SYSTEM: EN_terminology_in_ontologies%2817-03-09%29.pdf: Página 43
43
Introduction (II)
• Ss
•Non-Ontological Resource (NOR) is an existing knowledge resource whose
semantics has not yet been formalized by means of an ontology.
•Non-Ontological Resource Re-engineering refers to the process of
taking an
existing non-ontological resource and transforming it into an ontology.
speaker: SYSTEM
